data.message: Implement complete safety invariant system from threat model: Built threat model v1.1 with 7 threats, 5 attacker models, 8 safety invariants. Implemented all 8 as hookify rules: S1 (credentials), S2 (sink detection), S3 (network exfil), S4 (prod gate), S5 (governance), S6 (destructive bash), S7 (git force), S8 (telemetry). All tested, false positives fixed, backups saved. Repos synced to GitHub.
data.task: Implement complete safety invariant system from threat model
data.outcome: Built threat model v1.1 with 7 threats, 5 attacker models, 8 safety invariants. Implemented all 8 as hookify rules: S1 (credentials), S2 (sink detection), S3 (network exfil), S4 (prod gate), S5 (governance), S6 (destructive bash), S7 (git force), S8 (telemetry). All tested, false positives fixed, backups saved. Repos synced to GitHub.
